error_fixes.offending_line: <source src="hospital_video.mp4" type="video/mp4"> <!-- Add your video URL -->
error_fixes.fixed_line: <source src="hospital_video.mp4" type="video/mp4" alt="Hospital Video"> <!-- Add your video URL -->

success_criteria: input element, type of "file", missing an associated label.

error_fixes.problem_type: Input element type 'file' missing associated label

success_criteria: input element, type of "checkbox", missing an associated label

error_fixes.problem_type: Input element type 'checkbox' missing associated label
error_fixes.fixed_line: <input type="checkbox" id="agree" name="agree"><label for="agree">I agree to the terms and conditions</label>

error_fixes.problem_type: Font used not accessible to all users

success_criteria: In content implemented using markup languages, elements have complete start and end tags.

error_fixes.problem_type: Incomplete end tag for the video element
error_fixes.offending_line: Your browser does not support the video tag.

success_criteria: Audio or video element avoids automatically playing audio
fixed_example:
<video controls>
<source src="bookstore-video.mp4" type="video/mp4">
Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>

error_fixes.problem_type: Audio or video element avoids automatically playing audio
error_fixes.offending_line:
<video width="400" controls>
            <source src="hospital_video.mp4" type="video/mp4"> <!-- Add your video URL -->
            Your browser does not support the video tag.
        </video>
error_fixes.fixed_line:
<video width="400" controls muted>
            <source src="hospital_video.mp4" type="video/mp4"> <!-- Add your video URL -->
            Your browser does not support the video tag.
        </video>

success_criteria: select element missing an associated label
error_example:
<select id="filter">
<option value="genre">Genre</option>
<option value="author">Author</option>
<!-- Add more filter options -->
</select>
fixed_example:
<label for="filter">Filter</label>
<select id="filter">
<option value="genre">Genre</option>
<option value="author">Author</option>
<!-- Add more filter options -->
</select>

error_fixes.problem_type: Select element missing an associated label
select element missing an associated label
select element missing an associated label
error_fixes.offending_line: <source src="hospital_video.mp4" type="video/mp4"> <!-- Add your video URL -->
error_fixes.fixed_line:
<label for="hospital_video">Video:</label>
        <video id="hospital_video" width="400" controls>
            <source src="hospital_video.mp4" type="video/mp4"> <!-- Add your video URL -->
            Your browser does not support the video tag.
        </video>

error_fixes.problem_type: select element missing an associated label
